full_text:
As I said, Bill, I'm not sure what the effect of this device is on  
the camera and film. However, what I can tell you, as someone who has  
a lot of experience with photography, is that I have not yet seen a  
Luminator picture where the double looked significantly different  
from the model in such a way that it is clearly not the model. When  
and if I do, I will absolutely say so. But from what I have seen to  
date, I have to conclude these are not "spirits." I'd love them to be  
and if I thought they were, I'd be the first one in line to have my  
picture taken.

Ann
